text: Gilson Espírito Santo (born 25 October 1991), simply known as Gilson, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a defender for FC Porto Real and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Gilson made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2015. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers
title: Gilson (footballer, born 1991)
